articles.description: Indian users of Google Messages are facing a deluge of ads within Android’s default messaging app. Many of the worst offenders appear to be ads for personal loans, gambling companies, and life insurance. RCS appears to be part of the problem.
articles.content:
RCS appears to be the problem
A selection of the ads being sent to users.
Images: Ishan Agarwal

articles.content:

articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.title: Vivo's new flagship has a bigger, better in-display fingerprint sensor - The Verge
articles.description: Vivo has announced the X80 Pro, its latest flagship phone. Key features included its Zeiss-branded camera setup and a larger fingerprint sensor that’s easier to use.
articles.content:
And another array of Zeiss-branded cameras
